name: Gun Go Brrr 2
description:
In a wacky dystopian future, humanity is locked in a war with radioactive, sentient watermelons. It looks bad for the last few survivors - until our hero, Sin Sandía, comes along.

In Gun Go Brrr 2, you take on the role of Sin Sandía. You must eradicate the bloodthirsty watermelons - the fate of humanity lays in your hands.

Enemy Types:

  • Standard Sandía: The regular watermelon.
  • Soldier Sandía: This watermelon has slightly higher health than the Standard and also shoots at you.
  • Sizable Sandía: A super big and super slow watermelon. Tough to kill.
  • Speedy Sandía: This super fast watermelon moves toward you faster than you can move away from it. Shoot them to scare them off, then finish them before they can attack again.
  • Super Sandía: ???
